segments.text: Thank you for your visit to our company . I'd like to make an introduction for you . Is there anything in particular you'd like to know ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your company has a very good reputation , and I have been planning to visit it for a long time . What's the advantage of your factory over other plastics ones ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our production speed is almost twice the industry-wide average . And we've already expanded the factory this year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me the cost of production per unit ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm not familiar with that part . Let me call someone in charge .
segments.speaker: S1
